org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.process.impl

Interface DescriptionBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityDefinitionBuilder, ActorDefinitionBuilder, AutomaticTaskDefinitionBuilder, BoundaryEventDefinitionBuilder, BusinessDataDefinitionBuilder, CallActivityBuilder, DataDefinitionBuilder, EndEventDefinitionBuilder, GatewayDefinitionBuilder, IntermediateCatchEventDefinitionBuilder, IntermediateThrowEventDefinitionBuilder, ManualTaskDefinitionBuilder, ParameterDefinitionBuilder, ParameterDefinitionBuilder, ProcessDefinitionBuilder, ProcessDefinitionBuilderExt, ReceiveTaskDefinitionBuilder, SendTaskDefinitionBuilder, StartEventDefinitionBuilder, TextDataDefinitionBuilder, UserTaskDefinitionBuilder, XMLDataDefinitionBuilder

    public interface DescriptionBuilder
    Builder for all definition elements that have a description.
    Author:
    Matthieu Chaffotte, Emmanuel Duchastenier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DescriptionBuilder addDescription(String description)
      Adds a description to current element.

    • Method Detail

      • addDescription

        DescriptionBuilder addDescription(String description)
        Adds a description to current element.
        Parameters:
        description - the description to set on this element.
        Returns:
        this DescriptionBuilder, to allow to chain the calls.
